title: Detox with Herbal Medicine & Acupuncture | GJ Wellness
cleaned_text: According to TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine,) it is very important to detox in Spring and Autumn following the 5 Element theory of seasons. In Spring, we should detox the liver and strengthen our tendons and joints. In Fall, we should detox the large intestines and strengthen the lungs. There are several herbal formulas that can be used for detoxing. A careful evaluation will help determine which formula or formulas is best for each individual depending on the patient's imbalance and need. Our Detox program can also be used for colon cleanse when needed which will include herbal formulas, acupuncture & Qi Gong.
